sources.title: OGC API Features - Part 1 - Core corrigendum

name: processSummary schema
annotatedSchema:
allOf:
- $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/descriptionType/schema.yaml
- properties:
    id:
      type: string
    jobControlOptions:
      items:
        $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/jobControlOptions/schema.yaml
      type: array
    links:
      items:
        $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/link/schema.yaml
      type: array
    outputTransmission:
      items:
        $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/bblocks-ogcapi-processes/build/annotated/api/processes/v1/schemas/transmissionMode/schema.yaml
      type: array
    version:
      type: string
  required:
  - id
  - version
  type: object
